collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (11 total Queries, 11 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `tbl_students`.*, `tbl_users`.`username`, `tbl_users`.`email` as `user_email`, `tbl_users`.`first_name`, `tbl_users`.`last_name`, `tbl_users`.`phone` as `user_phone`, CONCAT(tbl_users.first_name, " ", tbl_users.last_name) as full_name FROM `tbl_students` JOIN `tbl_users` ON `tbl_users`.`id` = `tbl_students`.`user_id` WHERE `tbl_students`.`id` = '6' LIMIT 1

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `tbl_students`.*, `tbl_users`.`username`, `tbl_users`.`email` as `user_email`, `tbl_users`.`first_name`, `tbl_users`.`last_name`, `tbl_users`.`phone` as `user_phone`, CONCAT(tbl_users.first_name, " ", tbl_users.last_name) as full_name FROM `tbl_students` JOIN `tbl_users` ON `tbl_users`.`id` = `tbl_students`.`user_id` WHERE `tbl_students`.`id` = '6' LIMIT 1
